org.forgerock.openig.audit.internal

Class ForwardingAuditSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openig.audit.internal.ForwardingAuditSystem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuditEventListener, AuditSystem

    public class ForwardingAuditSystem
extends Object
implements AuditSystem
    Forward the AuditEvents to the registered audit listeners (final consumers of the events).

    No storage is done in this implementation for later connected agents notifications or for post-processing of emitted events.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface org.forgerock.openig.audit.AuditSystem

      • registerListener

        public void registerListener(AuditEventListener listener)
        Description copied from interface: AuditSystem
        Registers an event listener into this audit system. Once registered, it will receive all events generated by audit decorators hooked in this AuditSystem instance.
        Specified by:
        registerListener in interface AuditSystem
        Parameters:
        listener - registered listener
        See Also:
        ConditionalAuditEventListener

      • unregisterListener

        public void unregisterListener(AuditEventListener listener)
        Description copied from interface: AuditSystem
        Un-registers an event listener from this audit system. Once un-registered, it will not receive any event anymore.
        Specified by:
        unregisterListener in interface AuditSystem
        Parameters:
        listener - registered listener to un-register
        See Also:
        ConditionalAuditEventListener
